preferences.name: uspsConsumerKey
preferences.title: USPS Consumer Key
preferences.description: The consumer key from your app in the USPS developer portal

preferences.name: uspsConsumerSecret
preferences.title: USPS Consumer Secret
preferences.description: The consumer secret from your app in the USPS developer portal

preferences.name: upsClientId
preferences.title: UPS Client ID
preferences.description: The client ID for your app in the UPS developer portal

preferences.name: upsClientSecret
preferences.title: UPS Client Secret
preferences.description: The client secret for your app in the UPS developer portal

preferences.name: fedexApiKey
preferences.title: FedEx API Key
preferences.description: The API key for your project in the FedEx developer portal

preferences.name: fedexSecretKey
preferences.title: FedEx Secret Key
preferences.description: The secret key for your project in the FedEx developer portal

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
